room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: I've been wanting to try an escape room for some time now and it did not disappoint.I did "The Path" room with 4 others and we had a blast. Such an awesome brain teaser and while we didn't finish in time we came oooo-so-close and I can't wait to come back and try another room.If you're looking for a fun time for 6 or 10 people and interested in trying some different than the normal bar/restaurant then certainly give Denver Escape Room a try, it's sooo much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We came as a group of 6 where half of the group never did an escape room. We completed The Path and they loved it! Can't say too much about the room obviously, but it was themed and a great experience. Definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Path" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We completed the path, and it was super fun. It was a linear room and once we figured that out it was awesome. Goid props, great design. We had a lot of fun.
